testcase.classname: feature to test Jiva design Sweater Style Po Details screen functionality
testcase.name: Verify the Filter functionality in the Style expansion
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to Login page..........................................passed Then user enter the Username and password...................................passed And User click on the signIn................................................passed And Click on Sweater module.................................................passed Then Click on the Merchandising Module......................................passed And Click on Data Entry dropdown............................................passed And Click on the Style PO Details...........................................passed And User click on the Style Expansion.......................................passed And Validate whether the Selected IPO "IPO1806 / Style2" is displayed in the IPO list or not.passed And Click on the Filter Icon in Style Expansion.............................passed And Select the "Test buyer" in Filter option page...........................passed Then Select "Fall" in the Filter option page................................passed And Enter the Buyer "IPO1806" in Search By Buyer Style Or IPO...............passed And click on the Apply button...............................................passed And Select the IPO in the Styles List.......................................passed
